# Interactive component

```{r}

# select a subset of countries and compare their GDP per Capita over different years
library(dplyr)
write.csv(df.long %>%
  filter(Country.Name %in% c('France', 'Russia', 'United States', 'India', 'Monaco', 'Switzerland') &
           Indicator.Code == 'NY.GDP.PCAP.CD') %>% select(Country.Name, Year, Value), 'data/d3.csv')
```
